title: Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan Sells Large Block of This Tech Stock - Barron's
summary: Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan Sells Large Block of This Tech Stock - Barron's. Intel CEO sells large block of this tech stock to raise $16.5 billion in cash and stock.

title: Intel will lay off 15% to 20% of its factory workers, memo says - OregonLive.com
summary: Intel will lay off 15% to 20% of its factory workers, memo says. Intel to cut thousands of factory jobs globally, according to a leaked memo. The memo was leaked to OregonLive.com.

title: Intel Will Lay Off Oregon Factory Workers Starting in July - tech.co
summary: Intel Will Lay Off Oregon Factory Workers Starting in July - tech.co.com. Intel will lay off workers in Oregon in July, according to reports. The company has been in Oregon for more than 30 years.

title: Intel (INTC) Dips More Than Broader Market: What You Should Know - Yahoo Finance
summary: Intel (INTC) Dips More Than Broader Market: What You Should Know. Yahoo Finance: Intel ( INTC) Is Down More Than the broader market. The stock is down more than the wider market.

title: Intel Nova Lake-S reportedly supports DDR5-8000 memory and 36x PCIe 5.0 lanes - VideoCardz.com
summary: Intel Nova Lake-S reportedly supports DDR5-8000 memory and 36x PCIe 5.0 lanes. VideoCardz.com reports that the chip could be used in next-generation Intel processors.

title: Report: Intel factory worker layoffs could hit Rio Rancho facility - The Business Journals
summary: Report: Intel factory worker layoffs could hit Rio Rancho facility. The Business Journals reports that the layoffs could happen at the company's factory in Rio. The company has not commented on the report.

title: Intel Plans Major Layoffs in Global Factory Workforce - WebProNews
summary: Intel Plans Major Layoffs in Global Factory Workforce - WebProNews.com. Intel plans major layoffs in global factory workforce. Intel to lay off more than 1,000 people.

title: Report: Intel factory worker layoffs could hit 20% worldwide - The Business Journals
summary: Report: Intel factory worker layoffs could hit 20% worldwide - The Business Journals. Report: Intel factories could be hit with 20% of workers out of work by the end of the year.

title: Intel tells employees when to expect factory layoffs - OregonLive.com
summary: Intel tells employees when to expect factory layoffs - OregonLive.com. Intel says it will lay off workers at its Oregon manufacturing plant. The company says the layoffs are expected to begin in the coming months.

title: Intel adds more Arc GPUs to end of life — A750 Limited Edition rides into the sunset 3 years after launch - Tom's Hardware
summary: Intel adds more Arc GPUs to end of life — A750 Limited Edition rides into the sunset 3 years after launch. Tom's Hardware: A750 will go out with a bang, with the latest version of the A750 being the final version.

title: Intel Mesa Drivers Now Properly Report Battlemage BMG-G31 GPUs - Phoronix
summary: Intel Mesa Drivers Now Properly Report Battlemage BMG-G31 GPUs - Phoronix.Intel Mesa drivers now properly report Battlemage G31 graphics cards. The drivers are based on the latest version of the Linux kernel.
